price: 90. Alle wuxuu amraa caddaaladda, axsaan falka iyo siinta qaraabada (iyo deriska xaqooda), wuxuuna reebaa xumaanta, munkarka (xishood darrada) iyo gardarrada (dulmiga). Wuu idin waaninayaa, inaad ku waano qaadataan oo xusuusataan.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأۡمُرُ بِٱلۡعَدۡلِ وَٱلۡإِحۡسَٰنِ وَإِيتَآيِٕ ذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَيَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱلۡبَغۡيِۚ يَعِظُكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yamuru bil-ʿadli wal-iḥ'sāni waītāi dhī al-qur'bā wayanhā ʿani al-faḥshāi wal-munkari wal-baghyi yaʿiẓukum laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
